## Installation

You can install the development version of ggdistricts from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EvaMaeRey/ggdistricts")
```





```{r}
library(ggdistricts)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
districts_116_flat |>
mutate(id = 1:n()) |>
ggplot() +
  aes(state = STATE_NAME, 
      district = DISTRICT) +
  geom_district_116(state = "New York") +
  aes(fill = DISTRICT)
```



```{r}
library(ggdistricts)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
districts_116_flat |>
ggplot() +
  aes(state = STATE_NAME, 
      district = DISTRICT) +
  geom_district_116(state = "New York", linewidth = .02) +
  aes(fill = as.numeric(DISTRICT)) + 
  geom_district_116(state = "New York", 
                    district = 22, color = "red", linewidth = .05)
```
```{r, fig.height=100, fig.width=100}
districts_116_flat |>
ggplot() +
  aes(state = STATE_NAME, 
      district = DISTRICT) +
  geom_district_116(state = "New York", 
                    district = 22, 
                    color = "red", 
                    linewidth = 3)
```
